text: Stefan Grodzicki (4 August 1947 - 30 September 1976) was a Polish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, Germany. In the final standings of team mixed equestrianism eventing, Poland finished 10th of the 18 competing countries, 281.60 points behind the winner, Great Britain. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Polish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Poland Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Złotoryja
title: Stefan Grodzicki
